entries.name: json_create(object)
entries.desc: Deserializes JSON string by converting numerator value n, denominator value d, to a Rational object.

entries.name: as_json(*)
entries.desc: Returns a hash, that will be turned into a JSON object and represent this object.

entries.name: to_json(*args)
entries.desc: Stores class name (Rational) along with numerator value n and denominator value d as JSON string
